plot: Through a reflection on a window we see a restaurant, a couple, and the city. As the different layers blend, we see what appears to be beyond the surface. A coincidence? Sort of.
title: A Coincidence of Sorts
plot_es: Through a reflection on a window we see a restaurant, a couple, and the city. As the different layers blend, we see what appears to be beyond the surface. A coincidence? Sort of.
plot_en: Through a reflection on a window we see a restaurant, a couple, and the city. As the different layers blend, we see what appears to be beyond the surface. A coincidence? Sort of.
